scripts.build-minify: javascript-obfuscator src/main/resources/static/form-keeper.js --output src/main/resources/static/form-keeper.min.js --compact true --self-defending true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-encoding base64 --split-strings true --rename-globals true
scripts.build: npm run build-plane && npm run build-minify
